page.title: 12LEISURE AND RETIREMENT
page.content: As is to be expected in a rural area many of the residents, more especially the women, have a great interest in craft work as a way of spending long winter evenings. { Spinning}is practised by several people, with local farmers often providing the fleece.{Knitting, dress- {making}and{embroidery}all have their followers and there are several {artists}living in the block.{Patch- {work, Smocking, and Flower-arranging are done by three ladies on a small commercial basis. The{Live Arts}are represented by two world reknowned{opera singers, John {Mitchinson and Maureen Guy,}living at Cliffords Mesne and the{authoresses {Winifred Foley and Veronica Henriques have recently moved into the area. { Bee-keeping}and the production of honey is a hobby for several men.
